name: 黃琛傑
objective:
本課程透過詼諧有趣、寓意深遠的中國寓言故事來進行教學，不僅期盼能增進學者華語的聽、說、讀、寫的能力，更希望能藉此體會到華人的智慧，以及日常生活中的大道理。
This course is taught through humorous and meaningful Chinese fables. It not only hopes to enhance the ability of students to listen, speak, read and write, but also hopes to understand the wisdom of Chinese .
